wastage.translation[0].definitions[0].de: when something is lost or destroyed, especially in a way that is not useful or reasonable, or the amount that is lost or destroyed
wastage.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The system used to result in a great deal of food wastage.
wastage of ability among working class children

wastage.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a reduction in the number of people working for a company, organization etc because workers decide to leave or stop working, not because they have lost their jobs
wastage.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: We achieved a 40% reduction in staff through natural wastage and redeployment to other offices.
